messages.content: Mae Cymru ar groesffordd. Mae Covid-19 wedi amlygu degawdau o anghydraddoldeb a diffyg cynydd yng Nghymru, er gwaethar y cynlluniau gorau.

Wales faces a moment of truth. Covid-19 has exposed decades of deep and growing inequality inflicted on Wales by Westminster's contempt. It's time for fresh start to create a brighter future together, under the best NHS and a plan for the economy to bounce back. Vote Plaid Cymru: the best chance for a better future.

issues.health: It's time for fresh start to create a brighter future together, under the best NHS and a plan for the economy to bounce back.

images.caption: Vote Plaid twice for strong leadership and a clear direction.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Text is partially cut off and not all content could be included due to visibility.
